query: Please help me find a pasta recipe, rice recipe, and steak recipe, each with a carbohydrate content between 10 and 50 grams per gram. Among these recipes, which one has the highest calorie content and what equipment is needed for it?

api_list.description: Get information about a certain menu item.

required_parameters.name: item_id
required_parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

api_list.description: Use an ingredient id to get all available information about an ingredient, such as its image and supermarket aisle.

required_parameters.name: ingredient_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the food (ingredient).

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The amount of that food.

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: The unit for the given amount.

api_list.description: Summarize the recipe in a short text.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe that should be summarized.

api_list.description: Find a dish that goes well with a given wine.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The type of wine that should be paired, e.g. merlot, riesling, or malbec.

api_list.description: Find recipes which are similar to the given one.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the source recipe to which similar recipes should be found.

api_list.description: Search menu items (such as McDonalds Big Mac)

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of results to return.

required_parameters.name: minCalories
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of calories the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of protein the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of protein the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of carbs the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxCarbs
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of carbs the menu item can have.

api_list.description: Find a set of recipes that adhere to the given nutrient limits. Using this api when no specific food type is provided. All the found recipes will have macro nutrients within the calories, protein, fat, and carbohydrate limits.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin C milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin C in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of carbohydrates in grams the recipe must have

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minAlcohol
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of alcohol in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB6
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minIron
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of iron in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minSugar
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of sugar in grams the recipe must have

api_list.description: Get a recipe's taste. The tastes supported are sweet, salty, sour, bitter, savory, and fatty. These tastes are between 0 and 100 while the spiciness value is in scoville on an open scale of 0 and above.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Search for simple whole foods (e.g. fruits, vegetables, nuts, grains, meat, fish, dairy etc.).

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The partial or full ingredient name.

required_parameters.name: minProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name (lasagna), an ingredient name (salmon), or a cuisine (italian).

required_parameters.name: food
required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish ("steak"), an ingredient ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

api_list.description: Get a simple description of a certain wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

required_parameters.name: tags
required_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search packaged food products like frozen pizza and snickers bars.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query.

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the product can have.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of protein the product can have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of protein the product can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of carbs the product can have.

required_parameters.name: maxCarbs
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of carbs the product can have.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of results to retrieve, defaults to 10.

api_list.description: Get information about a recipe.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's nutrition widget data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: Get a recipe's nutrition widget data.

api_list.description: Get information about a packaged food product.

required_parameters.name: product_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the packaged food product.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's ingredient list.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's equipment list.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

query: Please help me find a pasta recipe, rice recipe, and steak recipe, each with a carbohydrate content between 10 and 50 grams per gram. Among these recipes, how many calories are in the one that contains the most ingredients?

api_list.description: Get information about a certain menu item.

required_parameters.name: item_id
required_parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

api_list.description: Use an ingredient id to get all available information about an ingredient, such as its image and supermarket aisle.

required_parameters.name: ingredient_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the food (ingredient).

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The amount of that food.

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: The unit for the given amount.

api_list.description: Summarize the recipe in a short text.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe that should be summarized.

api_list.description: Find a dish that goes well with a given wine.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The type of wine that should be paired, e.g. merlot, riesling, or malbec.

api_list.description: Find recipes which are similar to the given one.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the source recipe to which similar recipes should be found.

api_list.description: Search menu items (such as McDonalds Big Mac)

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of results to return.

required_parameters.name: minCalories
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of calories the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of protein the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of protein the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of carbs the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxCarbs
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of carbs the menu item can have.

api_list.description: Find a set of recipes that adhere to the given nutrient limits. Using this api when no specific food type is provided. All the found recipes will have macro nutrients within the calories, protein, fat, and carbohydrate limits.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin C milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin C in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of carbohydrates in grams the recipe must have

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minAlcohol
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of alcohol in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB6
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minIron
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of iron in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minSugar
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of sugar in grams the recipe must have

api_list.description: Get a recipe's taste. The tastes supported are sweet, salty, sour, bitter, savory, and fatty. These tastes are between 0 and 100 while the spiciness value is in scoville on an open scale of 0 and above.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Search for simple whole foods (e.g. fruits, vegetables, nuts, grains, meat, fish, dairy etc.).

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The partial or full ingredient name.

required_parameters.name: minProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name (lasagna), an ingredient name (salmon), or a cuisine (italian).

required_parameters.name: food
required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish ("steak"), an ingredient ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

api_list.description: Get a simple description of a certain wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

required_parameters.name: tags
required_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

required_parameters.name: tags
required_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

required_parameters.description: The minimum number of sugar in grams the recipe must have

required_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: number

api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name (lasagna), an ingredient name (salmon), or a cuisine (italian).

required_parameters.name: food
required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish ("steak"), an ingredient ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

api_list.description: Get a simple description of a certain wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

required_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Find a set of recipes that adhere to the given nutrient limits. Using this api when no specific food type is provided. All the found recipes will have macro nutrients within the calories, protein, fat, and carbohydrate limits.

required_parameters.description: The maximum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin C milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin C in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of carbohydrates in grams the recipe must have

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minAlcohol
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of alcohol in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB6
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minIron
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of iron in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minSugar
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of sugar in grams the recipe must have

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

query: Please help me find three random recipes tagged as vegetarian and dessert. Among these three recipes, which one has the lowest total cost? Also, what is the cheapest ingredient in that recipe?

api_list.description: Get information about a certain menu item.

required_parameters.name: item_id
required_parameters.description: Specify which page to query.

api_list.description: Use an ingredient id to get all available information about an ingredient, such as its image and supermarket aisle.

required_parameters.name: ingredient_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the food (ingredient).

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The amount of that food.

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: The unit for the given amount.

api_list.description: Summarize the recipe in a short text.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe that should be summarized.

api_list.description: Find a dish that goes well with a given wine.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The type of wine that should be paired, e.g. merlot, riesling, or malbec.

api_list.description: Find recipes which are similar to the given one.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the source recipe to which similar recipes should be found.

api_list.description: Search menu items (such as McDonalds Big Mac)

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of results to return.

required_parameters.name: minCalories
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of calories the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of protein the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of protein the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of carbs the menu item can have.

required_parameters.name: maxCarbs
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of carbs the menu item can have.

api_list.description: Find a set of recipes that adhere to the given nutrient limits. Using this api when no specific food type is provided. All the found recipes will have macro nutrients within the calories, protein, fat, and carbohydrate limits.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin C milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin C in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of carbohydrates in grams the recipe must have

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minAlcohol
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of alcohol in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB6
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minIron
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of iron in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minSugar
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of sugar in grams the recipe must have

api_list.description: Get a recipe's taste. The tastes supported are sweet, salty, sour, bitter, savory, and fatty. These tastes are between 0 and 100 while the spiciness value is in scoville on an open scale of 0 and above.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Search for simple whole foods (e.g. fruits, vegetables, nuts, grains, meat, fish, dairy etc.).

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The partial or full ingredient name.

required_parameters.name: minProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name (lasagna), an ingredient name (salmon), or a cuisine (italian).

required_parameters.name: food
required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish ("steak"), an ingredient ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

api_list.description: Get a simple description of a certain wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

required_parameters.name: tags
required_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name (lasagna), an ingredient name (salmon), or a cuisine (italian).

required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish ("steak"), an ingredient ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

required_parameters.name: tags
required_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin C milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin C in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.description: The minimum number of alcohol in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.description: The minimum number of sugar in grams the recipe must have

required_parameters.description: The partial or full ingredient name.

required_parameters.name: minProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxProteinPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxFatPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: minCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: maxCarbsPercent
required_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name (lasagna), an ingredient name (salmon), or a cuisine (italian).

required_parameters.name: food
required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish ("steak"), an ingredient ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

api_list.description: Get a simple description of a certain wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

required_parameters.name: tags
required_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Find a set of recipes that adhere to the given nutrient limits. Using this api when no specific food type is provided. All the found recipes will have macro nutrients within the calories, protein, fat, and carbohydrate limits.

required_parameters.name: minProtein
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxProtein
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of protein in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin C milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminC
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin C in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB2
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB3
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minCarbs
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of carbohydrates in grams the recipe must have

required_parameters.name: maxCalories
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of calories the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minAlcohol
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of alcohol in grams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: maxVitaminB6
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe can have.

required_parameters.name: minIron
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of iron in milligrams the recipe must have.

required_parameters.name: minSugar
required_parameters.description: The minimum number of sugar in grams the recipe must have

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name (lasagna), an ingredient name (salmon), or a cuisine (italian).

required_parameters.name: food
required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish ("steak"), an ingredient ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

api_list.description: Get a simple description of a certain wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. malbec, riesling or merlot.

api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. merlot.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

required_parameters.name: maxPrice
required_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

required_parameters.name: minRating
required_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

required_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.

api_list.description: Get a recipe's price breakdown data.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

required_parameters.name: cuisine
required_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes.

required_parameters.name: diet
required_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

required_parameters.name: intolerances
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

required_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
required_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients that must not be contained in the recipes.

required_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by, e.g., calories, protein,sugar and fiber.
